content: JetBrains Plugin integrates Sencha frameworks into all commercial versions of JetBrains IDEs including IntelliJ, WebStorm, PhpStorm, RubyMine, and PyCharm.
Eclipse Plugin integrates Sencha frameworks into the Mars and Luna versions of the Eclipse IDE.
Visual Studio Plugin integrates Sencha frameworks into the Enterprise, Professional, and Community editions of Microsoft Visual Studio IDE.
Visual Studio Code Plugin integrates Sencha frameworks into Microsoft Open Source VS Code IDE.
